entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
